name: elgato-light-controller
title: Elgato Light Controller
description: Control Elgato lights by IP address.
author: wassimk

preferences.name: ipAddresses
preferences.title: IP Addresses
preferences.description: Comma-separated IP addresses of Elgato lights.

preferences.name: brightnessChangeAmount
preferences.title: Brightness Change Amount
preferences.description: The amount to increment/decrement brightness by. Between 1 and 100

preferences.name: defaultBrightness
preferences.title: Default Brightness
preferences.description: The default brightness to set the light to. Between 1 and 100

preferences.name: defaultTemperature
preferences.title: Default Temperature
preferences.description: The default temperature to set the light to. Between 2900 and 7000

preferences.name: nightLightBrightness
preferences.title: Night Light Brightness
preferences.description: The default brightness to set the light to for night mode. Between 1 and 100

preferences.name: nightLightTemperature
preferences.title: Night Light Temperature
preferences.description: The default temperature to set the light to for night mode. Between 2900 and 7000

preferences.name: dayLightBrightness
preferences.title: Day Light Brightness
preferences.description: The default brightness to set the light to for day mode. Between 1 and 100

preferences.name: dayLightTemperature
preferences.title: Day Light Temperature
preferences.description: The default temperature to set the light to for day mode. Between 2900 and 7000

commands.name: turn-on
commands.title: Turn on
commands.description: Turn light(s) on to default settings

commands.name: turn-on-day-light
commands.title: Turn on Day Light
commands.description: Turn light(s) on to day light settings

commands.name: turn-on-night-light
commands.title: Turn on Night Light
commands.description: Turn light(s) on to night light settings

arguments.name: temperature
arguments.title: Temperature
arguments.description: The temperature to set the light(s) to.

commands.name: preferences
commands.title: Preferences
commands.description: Set the preferences for the Elgato light controller

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
